data.message: There is no way in da world dat I ain't going out like dat da soul ja for da brahda da hala fucking hala the maddest fucking bahbah the sweetest of da Allah in da corner in da ring a ding ding be my one ga ga say n I say step away n Daddy we in mofo DAT one and I Love The Way you R and I have a scar like wa da hark in the park in the frea frea tree a tree a Peace in you heart thank you for the starter pistol cap lock fake not
